headline: MEDIA ALERT: Equinix Sets Conference Call for First-Quarter Results
summary: Equinix, Inc. (Nasdaq: EQIX), the world's digital infrastructure company®, today announced that it will hold its quarterly conference call on Wednesday, April 30, 2025 at 5:30 p.m. EST (2:30 p.m. PST). The company will discuss first-quarter results for the period ended March 31, 2025.
